s.text: Compose a newspaper-style caption for the actual Reuters news photo shown below.
"Did you know that all of our presidents who weren't Masons were assassinated?
"Did you know that all of our presidents who weren't Masons were assassinated?

Sure, it's easy to decry the commercialization of the holiday, like putting trousers on all the figures in the nativity scene, adding a big electric sign that flashes: "Jesus Wore Khakis," and pocketing some pretty sweet change from the Gap.

As many News Quiz participants asserted, ours is a very observant, very Christian nation, so please be sensitive to the displays of religiosity that are so common this time of year, often with elaborate lighting.
